meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Murry Cann Rick Cook Bill Gellert Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #898.

td.p: Murry Cann, a financial consultant from Larkspur, California
Rick Cook, a writer from Phoenix, Arizona
Bill Gellert, a research associate from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $6,998)

tr.td: THE OLD WEST
OIL
FAMILIAR PHRASES
COMIC BOOKS
"MAN"LY MOVIES
PSYCH 101

div.onmouseover:

')
div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', 'City celebrated in song in both a 1959 Wilbert Harrison No. 1 hit & the following:

"Y\' c\'n turn the radiator on whenever you want some heat /
With ev\'ry kind o\' comfort ev\'ry house is all complete /
You c\'n walk to privies in the rain and never wet your feet! /
They\'ve gone about as fur as they can go (Yes sir!) /
They\'ve gone about as fur as they can go!..."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
City celebrated in song in both a 1959 Wilbert Harrison No. 1 hit & the following:
"Y' c'n turn the radiator on whenever you want some heat /
With ev'ry kind o' comfort ev'ry house is all complete /
You c'n walk to privies in the rain and never wet your feet! /
They've gone about as fur as they can go (Yes sir!) /
They've gone about as fur as they can go!..."

')
